text: Datagram Delivery Protocol (DDP) is a member of the AppleTalk networking protocol suite. Its main responsibility is for socket-to-socket delivery of datagrams over an AppleTalk network. *Note: All application-level protocols, including the infrastructure protocols NBP, RTMP and ZIP were built on top of DDP. ==External links== * - AppleTalk Management Information Base II *DDP Variable Specifications Category:Network layer protocols
title: Datagram Delivery Protocol
